title: FS:T206 Cobb - Red Portrait - SGC A
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS:T206 Cobb - Red Portrait - SGC A
posts.post_content: Trimmed for sure, probably along the bottom edge, but still a very sharp example with perfect registration and decent centering. Vibrant colors on front and bold printing on the back with no print marks, scuffing, or creasing anywhere. I wish my scanner delivered sharper images, because the pics don't do it enough justice. Asking $900 delivered; PayPal preferred.
